author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 28-year-old man and two of his associates were arrested by the police on Monday on charges of kidnapping a 23-year-old girl, who is a hotel management student, and forcing her to marry him.

Police said that the main accused, S. Ahmed Basheer of Vanniyar street in Porur works as an interior decorator and has already been married twice. On February 12, the woman had gone to T. Nagar with her mother after which she went missing.

Initially, it was believed she might have been lost in the crowd there. So, a woman missing case was filed. However, police said that investigations revealed that the accused had earlier approached the woman for marriage and was turned down.

Subsequently, with the help of two of his friends — Ramkumar (23) and Mani (24) — Ahmed Basheer kidnapped her in a car. Along with his associates, Ahmed Basheer was arrested and remanded in judicial custody, police said.
title: Three arrested for kidnapping woman
